name: reddit smaller (normal) font size fix
description: Brings back reddit's pre-2015 text size, which is smaller.
additional_info: On January 2015, reddit made a huge mistake: they greatly increased font sizes and line spacing. This massive text is a massive waste of screen space, reduces readability, and just plain looks terrible. This userstyle attempts to fix that. Formerly called Undo reddit's giant font & linespacing.

discussions.name: Negatively affects subreddits whose style already fixed issue
